Hatofu Boyfriend(Logo)
NEW STORY
START
EXIT
Test

The three of them are in the university lab room as the sky outside begins to darken. The fluorescent lights flicker slightly. Tae and the Nong Time are working while Pued stands by, offering distant moral support.
Tae: "Oh my god, I don't want to do it anymore..."
Tae: "Hurry up! I can't take it anymore..."
Nong Time: "Wait, let me write the lab plan a little more... It's almost done, can you please stop rushing me? I've forgotten!"
Tae: "It’s almost six already. They’re going to lock the building soon!"
Pued: Smiling coldly, "If you get stuck in the building, you’ll be in trouble. Especially with all the strange rumors about this place lately..."
Nong Time: "Alright, just a moment! Give me two more minutes."
Nong Time: "Ugh... This *Erebus odora*, a large moth with skull-like patterns—why did Professor Songsit make us study this? It’s so damn difficult!"

A faint knocking sound comes from the door before the guard appears from the shadowy corridor behind it. Suddenly, there are faint footsteps from the hallway outside the lab, but the three pay no attention.
Guard: "Hey kids, why are you still here? It’s late, you know. I need to lock the doors before I go home."
Tae: "Oh, we got caught up with the lab work. We’re about to leave, sir."
Guard: "There have been strange reports in this building recently. Let me warn you,Under no circumstances..."
Guard: "Shouldn't you go to the back door right now."
Nong Time: "Umm...Uhh...Thanks for the warning, sir!"
Tae: "Hey, Nong Time, we should leave now. They’re going to close the building soon!"
Pued: "The guard just warned us, man. Let’s not push it."
Nong Time: "Just a little more! I’m almost done. Let me wrap this up quickly."
Tae: "Oh no, Nong Time! Look, the lights are out. They must be about to lock the building. Let’s hurry and get out of here."
Nong Time: "Damn it! I didn’t save my work. Forget it, let’s go. Which way do you think we should leave?"
Pued: "Why don’t we check the front door first?"
Tae: With a panicked expression, "I think the front door’s a good idea, but if it’s locked, we can check the back door."
Nong Time: "Umm..."
Nong Time: "Alright, let’s check the front door first..."
"There was a sign on the guard's desk that said, "I will come and pee soon.""
Tae: "Where the hell did the guard go?"
Tae: "What do we do, Nong Time? Should we look for the guard or check the back door?"
Go to the bathroom
Check the back door
Nong Time: "I think we should go to the bathroom first. The guard mentioned he might be there."
Tae: "Do you smell something weird? It smells like... water..."
Nong Time: "Oh no! What is that? It's red...?"
Pued: "Don’t touch it if you don’t want trouble..."
"Tae: Would you like to taste it? It might be Hell Blue Boy's red juice."
Taste it mistery red stuff
Don\t taste it
Nong Time: "Oh god, this is underwear soaked in cum water!!" *about to puke*
Tae: Whoa, wait... I mean, go wash your hand right now!
Pued: "I told you not to touch it! Damn it, I knew there was something weird about it."
Nong Time: "Whatever, just keep it, I guess. But for now, let's get out of here..."
As they leave the bathroom, a thin, bony cat emerges from the corner. It stares at them with an unsettling gaze.
Pued: "The guard isn’t in the bathroom. Let’s head back to the front door."
Nong Time: "You lead the way. I don’t want to go first."
Tae: "But I don’t know the way… Alright, let’s try this."
"While walking there.. They didn't realize that they were going in the wrong direction."
Tae: "Damn! Did you hear something? It’s like something’s following us!"
Nong Time: "Shhh… It sounds like footsteps."
Pued: "Oh no, this is the back door! We’re going the wrong way!"
Suddenly, Brother To appears at the end of the hallway, staring sharply at them.
Brother To: "Oh… You’re still here, boys. How about releasing some testosterone with me, little guys?"
Tae: "Whoa! He’s a creep! Run!!"
Everyone tries to run, but Brother To’s incredible calves make escape impossible. They look for ways to hide as he gets closer.
"Little boys, you can't escape me. Come and hug me tight, little boyyyyyys."
Where do you want to hide?
Who do you want to hide behind?
Hide behind Pued
Hide behind Tae
Hide in the vending machine
Tae: "We have no choice now! Do we have anything to fight him with?"
Nong Time: "Yeah, we have no choice. I’ve got something that might work."
Nong Time: "You, Tae!" *kicks*
Pued: "Nooo! Aaaghhh!!"
The final scream of Pued before it fell silent...
Brother To: "Oh, come on. Put up more of a fight, boys. Don’t run away from my embrace."
Nong Time: "Damn it! I need to do something!"
Use an item
Don’t use an item
Nong Time: "Transform into Hentai Kamen!"
Brother To: "That’s… Hentai Boy!! Nooo, am I about to lose my manhood now, boy?"
*Dies from the Nong Time’s Hentai Boy power*
After an exhausting fight, they temporarily escape Brother To and head toward the guard’s office for the key to the exit.
Nong Time: "We have no choice, Tae. We need to find the guard’s key."
Tae: "Alright! Let’s hurry to the front door. We need to get out of here!"
Tae: "Let’s check the guard’s desk. There might be something useful."
Tae suddenly shows the Nong Time the key while stepping closer to him.
Tae: "Nong Time… I’m sorry, but I don’t think you’re getting out of here."
Nong Time: (shocked) "What?! What are you talking about, Tae? Aren’t we friends?!"
Tae: (chuckling) "Friends… Yeah, I thought we’d always be friends. But not anymore."
Tae: "You don’t get it, do you? I’m doing this because I love you, Nong Time."
Nong Time: "What? What do you mean by that?"
Tae: "I’m sure you’ll fall for me… Won’t you?"
Nong Time: "Don’t tell me!"
Tae: "That’s right. I’m the boss of gay. I don’t want you to leave. I want you to stay… here… with me… forever."
If you want to leave, you’ll have to make a choice.
Surrender
Resist
Nong Time: (pauses) "I… I guess I don’t have a choice, do I?"
Nong Time: "Fine… Just go easy on me."
Tae: "Hmm… I’ll make sure you never forget me. We’ll be together forever. No one will ever take you from me."
In the end, Nong Time gave up his manhood to Tae to save his life. From that day on, no one ever saw the boys from Building 5 again…
Nong Time: "No way! I’m not letting you do this, Tae!"
Tae: "Oh, you’ll resist, huh? Then I’ll force you to feel my masculinity."
Nong Time: "No! Aaahhh! I can’t take it anymore!"
In the end, no one ever saw the boys from Building 5 again…
Died from contracting coronavirus AIDS from a cat.\nGameOver
Finally, after that day at LC. 5, no one saw the young students again...\nGameOver
Died because of being attacked by Brother To without any means of self-defense...\nGameOver
Tae: "Whoa! Where'd that cat come from... Why does it look so creepy?"
Pued: "Don't mess with it. Did you see its eyes? They're... they're not normal. Aaaahhh!!"
Nong Time: I think It\'s Cute!!!!
"Nong Time: Why doesn't it unlock?"
"Pued: I told you it’s a fake key."
Ignore the cat
Play with the pussy
Nong Time: Good bye weird looking cat.
Tae: "We’re out of options! Got anything we can fight back with?"
Nong Time: "Yeah, we’ve got no choice. I’ve got something that might work."
Nong Time: "And that something… is *you*, Tae!"
Tae: "No way! You’re betraying me, Nong Time?!"
Bro To: "Oh, come on now! Don’t struggle, babe. Just stay in my arms, okay?"
Nong Time: "Oh, for crying out loud! Gotta do something already!"
Nong Time: "Time to transform… into Hentai Kamen!"
Bro To: "Wait, what? Hentai Boy?! Noooo, does this mean… I gotta give up my manliness?!"
After an exhausting fight, they managed to escape from Bro To—at least for now. They head off to find the guard and the key to the exit.
Nong Time: "We’re out of options, Tae. We have to find… the guard’s key."
Pued: "Got it! Let’s get to the front door, quick! We gotta get outta here!"
Pued: "Let’s check the guard’s desk. Maybe we’ll find something useful."
Nong Time: "There it is! We got the key! But… ew, what’s this sticky stuff on it? Whatever, at least we got the key. Let’s get out of here before anything else happens."
Guard: "Oh, found the key I left for you, huh? Hate to break it to ya, babe, but it’s useless. The *real* key? Yeah, it’s in my bag."
Nong Time: "What the hell, man! Why would you do that?! We need to get out of here!"
Pued: "No way… we’ve been played."
Guard: *chuckles softly* "I could let you kids go, you know."
Guard: *grinning slyly* "But, uh… there’s a little price to pay for that ‘free pass.’ You kids ready for it, baby?"
Your Options
Find the Guard
Use the Key
Nong Time: "Why the hell isn’t this key working?!"
Pued: "Told you it’s a fake key!"
Nong Time: *pauses and turns to Pued standing nearby* "I… I guess I’ve got no other choice, huh, Pued?"
Pued: *nods sadly* "Sometimes surviving means giving up something… important."
Nong Time: *silent for a moment* "I… I really have no choice, huh?"
Nong Time: "Fine… Just… go easy, okay?"
Guard: "Mmm… I’ll make sure you never forget me, babe. We’ll be together forever. Nobody’s taking you away from me. Now, come on in, babe!"
Guard: "Oh, by the way, I’m not actually a guard. I’m just a gay dude in a cosplay uniform. The real guards around here? Already knocked ‘em out and sent them packing. *laughs maniacally*"
Nong Time: "Oh great… it’s happening again, huh?"
And so, after that day, no one ever saw those college boys in Building B5 again...
Back To Menu
Died because the cat saw you ignoring it, so it looked at you with its clear claws behind you
Exiting The App
